fields.label: Spreadsheet ID
fields.description: Copy the ID from your Google Sheets URL (the part between /d/ and /edit). Example: 1A2B3C4D5E6F7G8H9I0J

fields.label: Sheet Name
fields.description: Name of the tab inside the spreadsheet (e.g., Sheet1, Data, etc.)

fields.label: Key Column
fields.description: The column header to use as the unique key for upsert (e.g., FileName, Email, ID)

fields.label: Data to Upsert
fields.description: Paste a JSON array of objects. Each object represents a row. Example: [{"FileName": "A", "University": "B", "Decision": "B"}]

fields.label: Confirm Upsert
fields.description: Check this box to confirm you want to upsert the data.
